
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53744146">
安装好crxmouse插件后配置常用功能带上滑、下滑、滚动顶部、滚到底部已全部配置，如图1。&nbsp;&nbsp;图2是源码图。底部是配置文件<br>
<img id="aimg_B0nnC" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.postimg.cc/rRDf2Z31/wechat-2025-08-26-135429-624.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.postimg.cc/rRDf2Z31/wechat-2025-08-26-135429-624.png"><br>
